description: Indian Railways is the backbone of travel in the country, offering an extensive network that is both economical and scenic. Booking in advance is crucial.
sentences: The IRCTC website and app are the official sources for booking train tickets.
Train tickets in India open for booking 120 days in advance.
Understand the different classes of travel (AC First, 2-Tier, 3-Tier, Sleeper, etc.).
Tatkal booking is an option for last-minute travel, but seats are limited.
Always check your PNR status for confirmation updates.
dos: Book your tickets as soon as the booking window opens, especially for popular routes.
Carry a valid government-issued ID proof during your journey.
Keep your luggage secured, especially during overnight journeys.
Check your coach and seat number before boarding.
donts: Don't rely on un-authorized agents for booking tickets.
Don't eat food from unauthorized vendors at stations or on the train.
Avoid traveling on a waitlisted ticket if it's not confirmed.
Don't inconvenience other passengers with loud music or conversations.
